meta.description: Optimize the number of demonstrations to maximize minty foam production under resource constraints.

sets.name: DEMONSTRATIONS
sets.description: Types of demonstrations performed in the science show.

params.name: mint_usage
params.description: Units of mint used per demonstration.

params.name: active_ingredient_usage
params.description: Units of active ingredient used per demonstration.

params.name: minty_foam_production
params.description: Units of minty foam produced per demonstration.

params.name: black_tar_production
params.description: Units of black tar produced per demonstration.

params.name: available_active_ingredient
params.description: Total available units of active ingredient.

params.name: max_black_tar
params.description: Maximum allowable units of black tar.

vars.name: demos
vars.description: Number of each demonstration to perform.

objective.name: max_minty_foam
objective.description: Maximize the total production of minty foam.

constraints.name: mint_constraint
constraints.description: Mint usage must not exceed available mint.

constraints.name: active_ingredient_constraint
constraints.description: Active ingredient usage must not exceed available active ingredient.

constraints.name: black_tar_constraint
constraints.description: Black tar production must not exceed the maximum allowable limit.
